com.github.astefanich.account

Class SimpleAccountManager

  • Object
    • SimpleAccountManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountManager

    public class SimpleAccountManager
extends Object
implements AccountManager
    Implementation class for the AccountManager interface. The AccountManager is responsible for protecting account passwords as well as creating, deleting, authenticating, and persistence account related data. Instances of this class should be created via the factory.
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Release any resources used by the AccountManager implementation.
      Account createAccount(String accountName, String password, int balance)
      Creates an Account, hashes the password, registers the AccountManager, and persists the Account (via the DAO).
      void deleteAccount(String accountName)
      Remove the Account.
      Account getAccount(String accountName)
      Lookup an account based on account name.
      void persist(Account account)
      Used to persist an account (updates Account info stored in the designated persistant memory location)
      boolean validateLogin(String accountName, String password)
      Check whether a login is valid.

      • createAccount

        public Account createAccount(String accountName,
                             String password,
                             int balance)
                      throws AccountException
        Creates an Account, hashes the password, registers the AccountManager, and persists the Account (via the DAO).
        Specified by:
        createAccount in interface AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name for Account to add
        password - the password used to gain access to the Account
        balance - the initial balance of the Account
        Returns:
        the newly created Account
        Throws:
        AccountException - if operation fails

      • validateLogin

        public boolean validateLogin(String accountName,
                             String password)
                      throws AccountException
        Check whether a login is valid. An account must exist with the account name and the password must match.
        Specified by:
        validateLogin in interface AccountManager
        Parameters:
        accountName - name of Account the password is to be validated for
        password - password is to be validated
        Returns:
        true if password is valid for account identified by accountName
        Throws:
        AccountException - if operation fails

      • close

        public void close()
           throws AccountException
        Release any resources used by the AccountManager implementation. Once closed further operations on the AccountManager may fail.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AccountManager
        Throws:
        AccountException - if operation fails
